channel.description: Recent content in Global Payout on 0x000216

item.title: Global Payout expands MoneyTrac assistance to the Philippines
item.description: Global Payout, a company that offers business-to-business electronic payment solutions, has expanded its proprietary MoneyTrac consolidated payment gateway (CPG) platform to the Philippines. MoneyTrac allows users to make secure payments to employees and business partners. Users can configure virtual accounts to meet specific payment needs, sending funds to bank accounts in supported countries, debit cards, credit cards, or even other users on the system. Bill Rochfort, President and VP of Sales, highlighted the significant opportunity in providing financial services to the Philippines’ large population, including millions of Filipinos working abroad (OFWs).
